trans-unit.source: DesignTimeVisibleAttribute marks a component's visibility.
trans-unit.target: DesignTimeVisibleAttribute 標記元件的可見性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes"></xref> is present, a visual designer can show this component on a designer.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes"></xref>沒有、 視覺化設計工具可以顯示此元件設計工具上。

trans-unit.source: The DesignTimeVisibleAttribute is a hint to the Designer.
trans-unit.target: DesignTimeVisibleAttribute 是設計工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The Designer will ignore this attribute for components that have a UI presence.
trans-unit.target: 在設計工具將會忽略這個屬性的元件，會顯示在 UI。

trans-unit.source: It can only be applied to classes.
trans-unit.target: 它只套用至類別。

trans-unit.source: The DesignTimeVisibleAttribute is most useful when you have a control that accepts child components.
trans-unit.target: 當您有接受子元件的控制項，DesignTimeVisibleAttribute 便最有用。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView?displayProperty=fullName> control's node items should not appear in the component tray because they are drawn by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView?displayProperty=fullName>因為它們會用來繪製控制項的節點項目不應該在元件匣中出現<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView?displayProperty=fullName>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> set to the default value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref>設定的預設值為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new with the property set to the given value in visible.
trans-unit.target: 建立新與屬性設定中指定的值為 visible 。

trans-unit.source: The value that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property will be set against.
trans-unit.target: 值，<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>屬性會設定針對。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: The default visibility which is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Yes" name="Yes" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設的可見度<xref uid="langword_csharp_Yes" name="Yes" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個執行個體是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: An Object to compare with this instance or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 與這個執行個體或 null 參考相比較的物件 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: if obj equals the type and value of this instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 具有相同的類型和值，這個執行個體; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating if this instance is equal to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個執行個體是否等於<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if this instance is equal to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref> value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>這個執行個體是否等於<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref>值; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Marks a component as not visible in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: 將標示為不顯示在視覺化設計工具中的元件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the component should be shown at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否顯示在設計階段元件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this component should be shown at design time, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it shouldn't.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此元件應該會顯示在設計階段或<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果它不應。

trans-unit.source: Marks a component as visible in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: 將標示為在視覺化設計工具中可見的元件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
